fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Dark Times: if you are lynched, the town gains another 24 hours in the day phase, and may lynch again.
- The Following is Announced, but is Not Real:
- Lost Hope: If you are lynched as good traveler, every town member is roleblocked tonight.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Every Third **Phase**, Kill Target Player in Real Time.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- This role cannot spawn naturally.
- You Enter the Town as a Neutral Killing Who Must Demolish the Town.
- If No More Than 1 Member of Each Factional Evil or Good Exist, the Town is Demolished and Everyone Still Alive Wins.

fields.name: Special Mechanic:
fields.value:
Travelling:
- If a player is not a spectator and wishes to join the game before night 2, they may decide to join as a Traveller. Limit of 1 per game, and travelling may be denied at the hosts discretion.
